body:
Lovely

I could feel it slipping deep inside me. Consuming me, my body wasn’t mine anymore, my mind, my voice. They were for someone else, all of it was for someone else. Lying there in that darkness, my form slipped along with it, coming loose, coming undone. And I kept begging for it to stop, that I couldn’t do it anymore, I couldn’t see, it was scary. It was frightening. I’d be lying if I said I wasn’t. Ha… Maybe that’s what was wrong with me, maybe I was a liar. Cause I told her I wasn’t scared. With a smile on my face and a gentle stroke against her body, I whispered to her , “I want you to do it. Mess me up. I’m not scared.”

But I was. Even then I was. And so even now I am. But maybe that was just it. The fear, the exhilarating feeling of danger, of the unknown. I loved it so much. I got high off it like drugs. But who knew… Who knew this was going to happen. Lying here. In this darkness. Who ever would be able to forsee this. Who could warn me. Lying here, in this darkness. On this bed. This beautiful canopy bed. It was soft and warm. But it hurt my skin, my wrist, my ankles. My thick neck. Sometimes I couldn’t breath. Wait- No… No, that was her hands. It was because of her hands, she likes to choke me. She’s so different to everyone else. Smiling genuinely, being kind and making jokes, laughing, even acting timid at some points. It’s like it’s not even her, like I’m seeing someone else… I hate her, but I’d never tell her cause I’m scared of her. But I think she knows I’m scared, I think she always knew. Sometimes she smiles at me like she does. And then I get confused. I get confused and wonder if actually I love her . If all along that was what I was really scared of. I get so confused. Even now as I glance over weakly into her dark doe brown eyes I’m confused.

Sometimes her eyes gleam red, shiny and taunting and heating up my skin like a torching fire. I wonder if every time I let her lay me down on this bed, I’m allowing myself to enter the gates of hell. Staring at her lips now I watch her lick away a bit of blood where I bit her and remember how my mom used to say women like her have demons. That I should stay away from them cause they bring nothing but bad karma.

She didn’t say how hard it would be, how good it felt to get lost in She never told me how beautiful she’d be. She just said it was dangerous, I guess she expected me to know when I saw one of those “women with a demon inside”, I guess maybe she never met one so she just didn’t know herself. But I guess I should’ve known, I always knew the most beautiful things were the most dangerous. So I should’ve known. But that’d be unfair to say, everyday she walks amongst the world and not one person notices. No one ever has.

She’s so good at it. Being normal, being human. Keeping her demons contained. I didn’t think they could love too you know. Mom never told me that either, and I suspect it’s because she didn’t think so. But demons love. Demons love too. You just can’t tell, it’s hard to understand cause it a bit twisted. The way a demon loves is… Abnormal.

Swirling of the colors, dark red, soft blues and greys, and then black. There’s black everywhere. When you close your eyes, when you open them. The love is the kind that hums against your skin, and it stings, and then it cools down and flows through your blood and becomes so so good. It makes your body tremble for more. See… that’s the dangerous kind of love. Because you’re not yourself anymore, someone else has you, playing with you like a toy, pulling strings, pressing the right buttons. Rewiring you. Messing you up. But you like it. You can’t stop coming back for more. But is that really even love? One wonders.

Maybe not to many, too most, to the sane. But demons love too, I promise you they do, even if it’s a little different they do. Cause their voice touches your skin like silk and whips, and even when it’s been days you can feel their hands touching places you’ve never let anyone else touch. And then more. Your wrist cause they like to hold you down. Restrain you, they like to watch you fight… Cause she knows it’s useless.

Demons love too. Just not in the way humans do. Like right now. She likes to watch me, I think that’s how she tells me she loves me. It’s also where I get confused about how I feel. She likes to watch me seated in her chair, arms and legs crossed. She was good at just sitting there watching me. Her control was so well tamed it scared me. But it wasn’t the worst part. It was when she got up, it was what she’d do next. And she got up just now. She just got up walking steadily to me. Her brown eyes like hell fire, looking down at my naked weak state. Usually I couldn’t see well, the way the lights were so dim in this room paired with how dazed I’d usually be it was difficult to focus.

But I was okay now and I could see her soft body hovering over me while her hand rested at her sides. Slowly she huffs out, and then smiles a little bit. And I think shamefully of how she’s got such a pretty smile. When one of her hands raises from her hip, I flinch. She smiles wider when noticing my reaction and my eyes well up with tears. She sucks her teeth with a tsk tsk sound, shaking her head and looks at me with sympathy. “You poor thing,” her soft voice is low and void, “Just look at you…” She leans down so her face is closer and she strokes my cheek gently, “I pity you, you know that?” She says that, but its almost as if she likes it. She sucks her teeth again and then sighs before sitting down on the bed running a hand through her dark brown hair. She leans forward to my hands where she unbound my wrist, and then does the same to my ankles. Before resting her elbows on her knees having her lithe back facing me only. Rubbing the sore areas I stare at her confused. But then I look away, remembering how I’m not supposed to stare at her too long unless she asks me to. “Umm…” My voice is so meak I don’t think she even noticed me trying to speak.

“Get dressed and go home.” She clasps her hands together. I snap my head back up and again I’m looking at her, “Wha… What?” We’d barely done anything tonight, and I can’t help but notice the sinking feeling of dissatisfaction in my stomach. I hadn’t even climaxed yet. I can’t just go home so bothered like this. “I said go home.” “But…” She turns around and looks at me but she doesn’t seem angry. Instead she leans towards me again resting her right hand against the mattress beside my left hip. And quickly I felt trapped in between her current position. She was leaning in so close, “But what?” She ask “I… I haven’t even,” fidgeting, I look down and away from her face. You could tell she had a bit of freckles if you were close enough to see them, even against her sienna toned skin.

And she had sharp eyes, but you couldn’t tell in her everyday attire. If she wanted to, she could make anyone who swung her way kneel before her . But she didn’t only because it’d ruin her everyday image. “I know,” her other hand is touching my face again. Stroking my cheek touching my hair, “Look at me.” She says calmly and I do, suddenly finding it hard to breath. I hated looking at her when we were this close. I felt like I wanted to run away yet also kiss her , but I could do neither.

Instead I could only stay there gazing at her thinking of how beautiful of a woman she was… “Does it feel frustrating?” She ask me and she sounds concerned. I nod, “Yes.” “Mm” she hand lowers to my chin and I watch her smile as she stares at my lips, “That’s good. When you go home. You can’t touch yourself you hear me?” “Wh-” “Answer the question.” I look away for a split second, “F-Fine.” “Good boy.” She kisses my cheek and whispers, “You’re such a good boy you know that? Makes me want to eat you whole.” “What about you then, won’t you-” “Hey, hey…” She says gently then her lids lower a bit and she cocks her head as she looks at me, and still smiling she says, “Don’t worry about that okay. If you question me one more time though, I’ll do something to make you cry okay.”

I swallow a lump in my throat and shut my eyes tightly pulling my knees close to my chest, “S-Sorry.” Immediately she begins stroking my arm in a coaxing manner, “Don’t do that. It’s okay. Just be good and listen and I won’t do anything bad okay. I promise. We don’t want that right?” “No,” I whisper. I open my eyes slowly but I still don’t look at her . “Okay, okay good then. Now get dresssed.” I do as she says.

Moving out of bed slowly since my body was a bit sore. I try to put my clothing on as quick as possible. It was my work clothes since I’d came here straight from it. A cheap suit I’d had sitting in the back of my closet. I put my dress shoes on and grab my keys then stand there in the the middle of the room staring at her back for a moment waiting for her to say something. I’m not sure if she knows I was done getting dressed since she hadn’t turned around to look at me. “I-I’m done, so… I’m just gonna go.” She doesn’t say anything and I make my way to the door. Before I can open it though, she stops me, “Wait. Come here.” “Ah… Okay.” I put my keys in my pocket and walk to the other side of the bed and stand before her . “Come closer… get on your knees… Good.”

She smiles, seemingly satisfied and my face heats. She grabs my pale hands into her brown ones and places one on each of her knees. I look up at her confused her bangs cover her eyes as she looks down at me. She had springy curls that fell over her forehead in the front. All I could see was her upturned button nose, her lips which still has a bit of blood, and the under-defined, gentle shaped lower half of her face. Her jaw was soft but mature. “Were you planning on leaving without kissing me goodbye,” she pats my head and her fingers rest in between the locks of my short tossled hair.

I had washed it and did my best to style it knowing I was coming here today. Sometimes she gives me compliments and foolishly I become pleased by them. “I’m sorry I didn’t know-” “Didn’t know?” She almost laughed, “That’d be rude to say now wouldn’t it. Surely I’ve taught you better than that.” “I’m really sorry.” She sighs heavily then shakes her head, “You say that a lot don’t you… Sorry. Stop saying sorry. Just do better."She grabs my chin and lifts my face higher, "It’s okay for today. Come here.” She presses her lips against mine and not once do I feel her tongue against my own and I think about how well she restricted herself tonight. Sometimes I wonder if she likes the pent up tension.

Cause whenever she does this, it calls for a future session of heavy and long activities. I’d be lying if I said I didn’t like it too. When she pulls away from me I lick my lips and taste her blood against my tongue. “Ah, yes…” She notices, “You like to bite a lot, Stevie. I’ll have to punish you for that one of these days right?” “Y-You said you liked it…” I whisper. “Yes I did.” She laughs then just stares a moment until satisfied and she says, “Well go on then. Drive safe love. Good night.” I stare at her then, boldly in the eyes as she leans back and her bangs shift out of the way. Her smile is playful and she looks amused. I look away then and leave.

“Goodnight.” I say before shutting the door behind me. I walk quickly out the apartment building, not stopping to say hello to anyone or even meeting anyone’s gaze. And in the car I sit there in the parking lot for a few minutes. Starting the car but not moving. The radio played lowly in the background a song I’ve heard frequently now and I wonder if it’s a top hit. I hear her sing it sometimes. She’s got a nice voice. Gentle and deep.

Very coaxing, the kind that can put you to sleep. It wasn’t monotone though, but instead a nice mixure of peaceful yet sexy… I stare down at my hands playing with my bitten up nails. Then I notice my sheer black stalkings, I’m still lost on when and how she convinced me to wear them for her. She had torn them before pushing me onto her bed and tying me up. And then she played with me. Endlessly teasing. Stopping just before I climaxed, and continued the cycle. Before she left me tied onto the bed, and then sat in her chair to just watch me, she’d tell to me open my legs wider, or to arch my back, to turn my head, expose my neck. Sometimes she’d untie my hands and tell me to touch myself and to not take my eyes off of her as I do. And at times she’d do that for so so long, I’d lose track of time.

But it was mostly from the cause of me being unable to think straight. Sighing I raise the radios volume and then remove my stockings, stuffing them in glove compartment. I had suggested not wearing stockings once and she told me not to ask her about it ever again. She liked seeing me in them through out the day, she liked the idea of having to rip them off. She even tried giving me the money to buy new ones. Which had become constant now. Throughout the day it was kind of different. The habits were a bit switched mainly, and she was much more lenient usually because she had to be. But at the same time, I never could expect what she’d do. It was always sudden always new. Always sensual. Sighing, I feel my pants tighten as I remember the ways she’s touched my body. But then I lift my hands gripping the wheel as I remember how she’s told me not to touch myself. So instead I switch the gear to drive, and I head home.

My apartment was much bigger than hers. But it was more dark and less welcoming. Bucky liked to come over a lot and decorate. I had soft beige carpeting, while she had grey. My kitchen was bigger but had less food. My bathroom a bit messy, my bed king sized and by the window so I had view of the sky at night. Her average sized canopy bed rested far from the window, more against the wall in the middle of the room. Her windows were small , her decorations orderly and sleek. Minimal.

The curtains in her room which were light and colored lilac were always kept open, which contributed to the brightness of her room. But it fit her. That night I slept holding a T-shirt I had stolen from her in secrecy only because she wouldn’t let me keep any of her clothing. I remember taking it to help me feel as though I slept with her at night. She’d send me back home usually after spending time together, and if it was too late she’d let me sleep in her bed while she slept on the sofa. I slip my hands in between my legs and curl into a ball underneath my covers. It was cold that night. Middle November. So it was starting to chill.

I could feel it slipping deep inside me. Consuming me, my body wasn’t mine anymore, my mind, my voice. They were for someone else, all of it was for someone else. Lying there in that darkness, my form slipped along with it, coming loose, coming undone. And I kept begging for it to stop, that I couldn’t do it anymore, I couldn’t see, it was scary. It was frightening. I’d be lying if I said I wasn’t. Ha… Maybe that’s what was wrong with me, maybe I was a liar. Cause I told her I wasn’t scared. With a smile on my face and a gentle stroke against her body, I whispered to her , “I want you to do it. Mess me up. I’m not scared.”

But I was. Even then I was. And so even now I am. But maybe that was just it. The fear, the exhilarating feeling of danger, of the unknown. I loved it so much. I got high off it like drugs. But who knew… Who knew this was going to happen. Lying here. In this darkness. Who ever would be able to forsee this. Who could warn me. Lying here, in this darkness. On this bed. This beautiful canopy bed. It was soft and warm. But it hurt my skin, my wrist, my ankles. My thick neck. Sometimes I couldn’t breath. Wait- No… No, that was her hands. It was because of her hands, she likes to choke me. She’s so different to everyone else. Smiling genuinely, being kind and making jokes, laughing, even acting timid at some points. It’s like it’s not even her, like I’m seeing someone else… I hate her, but I’d never tell her cause I’m scared of her. But I think she knows I’m scared, I think she always knew. Sometimes she smiles at me like she does. And then I get confused. I get confused and wonder if actually I love her . If all along that was what I was really scared of. I get so confused. Even now as I glance over weakly into her dark doe brown eyes I’m confused.

Sometimes her eyes gleam red, shiny and taunting and heating up my skin like a torching fire. I wonder if every time I let her lay me down on this bed, I’m allowing myself to enter the gates of hell. Staring at her lips now I watch her lick away a bit of blood where I bit her and remember how my mom used to say women like her have demons. That I should stay away from them cause they bring nothing but bad karma.

She didn’t say how hard it would be, how good it felt to get lost in She never told me how beautiful she’d be. She just said it was dangerous, I guess she expected me to know when I saw one of those “women with a demon inside”, I guess maybe she never met one so she just didn’t know herself. But I guess I should’ve known, I always knew the most beautiful things were the most dangerous. So I should’ve known. But that’d be unfair to say, everyday she walks amongst the world and not one person notices. No one ever has.

She’s so good at it. Being normal, being human. Keeping her demons contained. I didn’t think they could love too you know. Mom never told me that either, and I suspect it’s because she didn’t think so. But demons love. Demons love too. You just can’t tell, it’s hard to understand cause it a bit twisted. The way a demon loves is… Abnormal.

Swirling of the colors, dark red, soft blues and greys, and then black. There’s black everywhere. When you close your eyes, when you open them. The love is the kind that hums against your skin, and it stings, and then it cools down and flows through your blood and becomes so so good. It makes your body tremble for more. See… that’s the dangerous kind of love. Because you’re not yourself anymore, someone else has you, playing with you like a toy, pulling strings, pressing the right buttons. Rewiring you. Messing you up. But you like it. You can’t stop coming back for more. But is that really even love? One wonders.

Maybe not to many, too most, to the sane. But demons love too, I promise you they do, even if it’s a little different they do. Cause their voice touches your skin like silk and whips, and even when it’s been days you can feel their hands touching places you’ve never let anyone else touch. And then more. Your wrist cause they like to hold you down. Restrain you, they like to watch you fight… Cause she knows it’s useless.

Demons love too. Just not in the way humans do. Like right now. She likes to watch me, I think that’s how she tells me she loves me. It’s also where I get confused about how I feel. She likes to watch me seated in her chair, arms and legs crossed. She was good at just sitting there watching me. Her control was so well tamed it scared me. But it wasn’t the worst part. It was when she got up, it was what she’d do next. And she got up just now. She just got up walking steadily to me. Her brown eyes like hell fire, looking down at my naked weak state. Usually I couldn’t see well, the way the lights were so dim in this room paired with how dazed I’d usually be it was difficult to focus.

But I was okay now and I could see her soft body hovering over me while her hand rested at her sides. Slowly she huffs out, and then smiles a little bit. And I think shamefully of how she’s got such a pretty smile. When one of her hands raises from her hip, I flinch. She smiles wider when noticing my reaction and my eyes well up with tears. She sucks her teeth with a tsk tsk sound, shaking her head and looks at me with sympathy. “You poor thing,” her soft voice is low and void, “Just look at you…” She leans down so her face is closer and she strokes my cheek gently, “I pity you, you know that?” She says that, but its almost as if she likes it. She sucks her teeth again and then sighs before sitting down on the bed running a hand through her dark brown hair. She leans forward to my hands where she unbound my wrist, and then does the same to my ankles. Before resting her elbows on her knees having her lithe back facing me only. Rubbing the sore areas I stare at her confused. But then I look away, remembering how I’m not supposed to stare at her too long unless she asks me to. “Umm…” My voice is so meak I don’t think she even noticed me trying to speak.

“Get dressed and go home.” She clasps her hands together. I snap my head back up and again I’m looking at her, “Wha… What?” We’d barely done anything tonight, and I can’t help but notice the sinking feeling of dissatisfaction in my stomach. I hadn’t even climaxed yet. I can’t just go home so bothered like this. “I said go home.” “But…” She turns around and looks at me but she doesn’t seem angry. Instead she leans towards me again resting her right hand against the mattress beside my left hip. And quickly I felt trapped in between her current position. She was leaning in so close, “But what?” She ask “I… I haven’t even,” fidgeting, I look down and away from her face. You could tell she had a bit of freckles if you were close enough to see them, even against her sienna toned skin.

And she had sharp eyes, but you couldn’t tell in her everyday attire. If she wanted to, she could make anyone who swung her way kneel before her . But she didn’t only because it’d ruin her everyday image. “I know,” her other hand is touching my face again. Stroking my cheek touching my hair, “Look at me.” She says calmly and I do, suddenly finding it hard to breath. I hated looking at her when we were this close. I felt like I wanted to run away yet also kiss her , but I could do neither.

Instead I could only stay there gazing at her thinking of how beautiful of a woman she was… “Does it feel frustrating?” She ask me and she sounds concerned. I nod, “Yes.” “Mm” she hand lowers to my chin and I watch her smile as she stares at my lips, “That’s good. When you go home. You can’t touch yourself you hear me?” “Wh-” “Answer the question.” I look away for a split second, “F-Fine.” “Good boy.” She kisses my cheek and whispers, “You’re such a good boy you know that? Makes me want to eat you whole.” “What about you then, won’t you-” “Hey, hey…” She says gently then her lids lower a bit and she cocks her head as she looks at me, and still smiling she says, “Don’t worry about that okay. If you question me one more time though, I’ll do something to make you cry okay.”

I swallow a lump in my throat and shut my eyes tightly pulling my knees close to my chest, “S-Sorry.” Immediately she begins stroking my arm in a coaxing manner, “Don’t do that. It’s okay. Just be good and listen and I won’t do anything bad okay. I promise. We don’t want that right?” “No,” I whisper. I open my eyes slowly but I still don’t look at her . “Okay, okay good then. Now get dresssed.” I do as she says.

Moving out of bed slowly since my body was a bit sore. I try to put my clothing on as quick as possible. It was my work clothes since I’d came here straight from it. A cheap suit I’d had sitting in the back of my closet. I put my dress shoes on and grab my keys then stand there in the the middle of the room staring at her back for a moment waiting for her to say something. I’m not sure if she knows I was done getting dressed since she hadn’t turned around to look at me. “I-I’m done, so… I’m just gonna go.” She doesn’t say anything and I make my way to the door. Before I can open it though, she stops me, “Wait. Come here.” “Ah… Okay.” I put my keys in my pocket and walk to the other side of the bed and stand before her . “Come closer… get on your knees… Good.”

She smiles, seemingly satisfied and my face heats. She grabs my pale hands into her brown ones and places one on each of her knees. I look up at her confused her bangs cover her eyes as she looks down at me. She had springy curls that fell over her forehead in the front. All I could see was her upturned button nose, her lips which still has a bit of blood, and the under-defined, gentle shaped lower half of her face. Her jaw was soft but mature. “Were you planning on leaving without kissing me goodbye,” she pats my head and her fingers rest in between the locks of my short tossled hair.

I had washed it and did my best to style it knowing I was coming here today. Sometimes she gives me compliments and foolishly I become pleased by them. “I’m sorry I didn’t know-” “Didn’t know?” She almost laughed, “That’d be rude to say now wouldn’t it. Surely I’ve taught you better than that.” “I’m really sorry.” She sighs heavily then shakes her head, “You say that a lot don’t you… Sorry. Stop saying sorry. Just do better."She grabs my chin and lifts my face higher, "It’s okay for today. Come here.” She presses her lips against mine and not once do I feel her tongue against my own and I think about how well she restricted herself tonight. Sometimes I wonder if she likes the pent up tension.

Cause whenever she does this, it calls for a future session of heavy and long activities. I’d be lying if I said I didn’t like it too. When she pulls away from me I lick my lips and taste her blood against my tongue. “Ah, yes…” She notices, “You like to bite a lot, Stevie. I’ll have to punish you for that one of these days right?” “Y-You said you liked it…” I whisper. “Yes I did.” She laughs then just stares a moment until satisfied and she says, “Well go on then. Drive safe love. Good night.” I stare at her then, boldly in the eyes as she leans back and her bangs shift out of the way. Her smile is playful and she looks amused. I look away then and leave.

But who knew… Who knew this was going to happen. Lying here. In this darkness. Who ever would be able to forsee this. Who could warn me. Lying here, in this darkness. On this bed. This beautiful canopy bed. It was soft and warm. But it hurt my skin, my wrist, my ankles. My thick neck. Sometimes I couldn’t breath. Wait- No… No, that was her hands. It was because of her hands, she likes to choke me. She’s so different to everyone else. Smiling genuinely, being kind and making jokes, laughing, even acting timid at some points. It’s like it’s not even her, like I’m seeing someone else… I hate her, but I’d never tell her cause I’m scared of her. But I think she knows I’m scared, I think she always knew. Sometimes she smiles at me like she does. And then I get confused. I get confused and wonder if actually I love her . If all along that was what I was really scared of. I get so confused. Even now as I glance over weakly into her dark doe brown eyes I’m confused.

Sometimes her eyes gleam red, shiny and taunting and heating up my skin like a torching fire. I wonder if every time I let her lay me down on this bed, I’m allowing myself to enter the gates of hell. Staring at her lips now I watch her lick away a bit of blood where I bit her and remember how my mom used to say women like her have demons. That I should stay away from them cause they bring nothing but bad karma.

She didn’t say how hard it would be, how good it felt to get lost in She never told me how beautiful she’d be. She just said it was dangerous, I guess she expected me to know when I saw one of those “women with a demon inside”, I guess maybe she never met one so she just didn’t know herself. But I guess I should’ve known, I always knew the most beautiful things were the most dangerous. So I should’ve known. But that’d be unfair to say, everyday she walks amongst the world and not one person notices. No one ever has.

She’s so good at it. Being normal, being human. Keeping her demons contained. I didn’t think they could love too you know. Mom never told me that either, and I suspect it’s because she didn’t think so. But demons love. Demons love too. You just can’t tell, it’s hard to understand cause it a bit twisted. The way a demon loves is… Abnormal.

Swirling of the colors, dark red, soft blues and greys, and then black. There’s black everywhere. When you close your eyes, when you open them. The love is the kind that hums against your skin, and it stings, and then it cools down and flows through your blood and becomes so so good. It makes your body tremble for more. See… that’s the dangerous kind of love. Because you’re not yourself anymore, someone else has you, playing with you like a toy, pulling strings, pressing the right buttons. Rewiring you. Messing you up. But you like it. You can’t stop coming back for more. But is that really even love? One wonders.

Maybe not to many, too most, to the sane. But demons love too, I promise you they do, even if it’s a little different they do. Cause their voice touches your skin like silk and whips, and even when it’s been days you can feel their hands touching places you’ve never let anyone else touch. And then more. Your wrist cause they like to hold you down. Restrain you, they like to watch you fight… Cause she knows it’s useless.

Demons love too. Just not in the way humans do. Like right now. She likes to watch me, I think that’s how she tells me she loves me. It’s also where I get confused about how I feel. She likes to watch me seated in her chair, arms and legs crossed. She was good at just sitting there watching me. Her control was so well tamed it scared me. But it wasn’t the worst part. It was when she got up, it was what she’d do next. And she got up just now. She just got up walking steadily to me. Her brown eyes like hell fire, looking down at my naked weak state. Usually I couldn’t see well, the way the lights were so dim in this room paired with how dazed I’d usually be it was difficult to focus.

But I was okay now and I could see her soft body hovering over me while her hand rested at her sides. Slowly she huffs out, and then smiles a little bit. And I think shamefully of how she’s got such a pretty smile. When one of her hands raises from her hip, I flinch. She smiles wider when noticing my reaction and my eyes well up with tears. She sucks her teeth with a tsk tsk sound, shaking her head and looks at me with sympathy. “You poor thing,” her soft voice is low and void, “Just look at you…” She leans down so her face is closer and she strokes my cheek gently, “I pity you, you know that?” She says that, but its almost as if she likes it. She sucks her teeth again and then sighs before sitting down on the bed running a hand through her dark brown hair. She leans forward to my hands where she unbound my wrist, and then does the same to my ankles. Before resting her elbows on her knees having her lithe back facing me only. Rubbing the sore areas I stare at her confused. But then I look away, remembering how I’m not supposed to stare at her too long unless she asks me to. “Umm…” My voice is so meak I don’t think she even noticed me trying to speak.

“Get dressed and go home.” She clasps her hands together. I snap my head back up and again I’m looking at her, “Wha… What?” We’d barely done anything tonight, and I can’t help but notice the sinking feeling of dissatisfaction in my stomach. I hadn’t even climaxed yet. I can’t just go home so bothered like this. “I said go home.” “But…” She turns around and looks at me but she doesn’t seem angry. Instead she leans towards me again resting her right hand against the mattress beside my left hip. And quickly I felt trapped in between her current position. She was leaning in so close, “But what?” She ask “I… I haven’t even,” fidgeting, I look down and away from her face. You could tell she had a bit of freckles if you were close enough to see them, even against her sienna toned skin.

And she had sharp eyes, but you couldn’t tell in her everyday attire. If she wanted to, she could make anyone who swung her way kneel before her . But she didn’t only because it’d ruin her everyday image. “I know,” her other hand is touching my face again. Stroking my cheek touching my hair, “Look at me.” She says calmly and I do, suddenly finding it hard to breath. I hated looking at her when we were this close. I felt like I wanted to run away yet also kiss her , but I could do neither.

Instead I could only stay there gazing at her thinking of how beautiful of a woman she was… “Does it feel frustrating?” She ask me and she sounds concerned. I nod, “Yes.” “Mm” she hand lowers to my chin and I watch her smile as she stares at my lips, “That’s good. When you go home. You can’t touch yourself you hear me?” “Wh-” “Answer the question.” I look away for a split second, “F-Fine.” “Good boy.” She kisses my cheek and whispers, “You’re such a good boy you know that? Makes me want to eat you whole.” “What about you then, won’t you-” “Hey, hey…” She says gently then her lids lower a bit and she cocks her head as she looks at me, and still smiling she says, “Don’t worry about that okay. If you question me one more time though, I’ll do something to make you cry okay.”

I swallow a lump in my throat and shut my eyes tightly pulling my knees close to my chest, “S-Sorry.” Immediately she begins stroking my arm in a coaxing manner, “Don’t do that. It’s okay. Just be good and listen and I won’t do anything bad okay. I promise. We don’t want that right?” “No,” I whisper. I open my eyes slowly but I still don’t look at her . “Okay, okay good then. Now get dresssed.” I do as she says.

Moving out of bed slowly since my body was a bit sore. I try to put my clothing on as quick as possible. It was my work clothes since I’d came here straight from it. A cheap suit I’d had sitting in the back of my closet. I put my dress shoes on and grab my keys then stand there in the the middle of the room staring at her back for a moment waiting for her to say something. I’m not sure if she knows I was done getting dressed since she hadn’t turned around to look at me. “I-I’m done, so… I’m just gonna go.” She doesn’t say anything and I make my way to the door. Before I can open it though, she stops me, “Wait. Come here.” “Ah… Okay.” I put my keys in my pocket and walk to the other side of the bed and stand before her . “Come closer… get on your knees… Good.”

She smiles, seemingly satisfied and my face heats. She grabs my pale hands into her brown ones and places one on each of her knees. I look up at her confused her bangs cover her eyes as she looks down at me. She had springy curls that fell over her forehead in the front. All I could see was her upturned button nose, her lips which still has a bit of blood, and the under-defined, gentle shaped lower half of her face. Her jaw was soft but mature. “Were you planning on leaving without kissing me goodbye,” she pats my head and her fingers rest in between the locks of my short tossled hair.

I had washed it and did my best to style it knowing I was coming here today. Sometimes she gives me compliments and foolishly I become pleased by them. “I’m sorry I didn’t know-” “Didn’t know?” She almost laughed, “That’d be rude to say now wouldn’t it. Surely I’ve taught you better than that.” “I’m really sorry.” She sighs heavily then shakes her head, “You say that a lot don’t you… Sorry. Stop saying sorry. Just do better."She grabs my chin and lifts my face higher, "It’s okay for today. Come here.” She presses her lips against mine and not once do I feel her tongue against my own and I think about how well she restricted herself tonight. Sometimes I wonder if she likes the pent up tension.

Cause whenever she does this, it calls for a future session of heavy and long activities. I’d be lying if I said I didn’t like it too. When she pulls away from me I lick my lips and taste her blood against my tongue. “Ah, yes…” She notices, “You like to bite a lot, Stevie. I’ll have to punish you for that one of these days right?” “Y-You said you liked it…” I whisper. “Yes I did.” She laughs then just stares a moment until satisfied and she says, “Well go on then. Drive safe love. Good night.” I stare at her then, boldly in the eyes as she leans back and her bangs shift out of the way. Her smile is playful and she looks amused. I look away then and leave.

“Goodnight.” I say before shutting the door behind me. I walk quickly out the apartment building, not stopping to say hello to anyone or even meeting anyone’s gaze. And in the car I sit there in the parking lot for a few minutes. Starting the car but not moving. The radio played lowly in the background a song I’ve heard frequently now and I wonder if it’s a top hit. I hear her sing it sometimes. She’s got a nice voice. Gentle and deep.

Very coaxing, the kind that can put you to sleep. It wasn’t monotone though, but instead a nice mixure of peaceful yet sexy… I stare down at my hands playing with my bitten up nails. Then I notice my sheer black stalkings, I’m still lost on when and how she convinced me to wear them for her. She had torn them before pushing me onto her bed and tying me up. And then she played with me. Endlessly teasing. Stopping just before I climaxed, and continued the cycle. Before she left me tied onto the bed, and then sat in her chair to just watch me, she’d tell to me open my legs wider, or to arch my back, to turn my head, expose my neck. Sometimes she’d untie my hands and tell me to touch myself and to not take my eyes off of her as I do. And at times she’d do that for so so long, I’d lose track of time.

But it was mostly from the cause of me being unable to think straight. Sighing I raise the radios volume and then remove my stockings, stuffing them in glove compartment. I had suggested not wearing stockings once and she told me not to ask her about it ever again. She liked seeing me in them through out the day, she liked the idea of having to rip them off. She even tried giving me the money to buy new ones. Which had become constant now. Throughout the day it was kind of different. The habits were a bit switched mainly, and she was much more lenient usually because she had to be. But at the same time, I never could expect what she’d do. It was always sudden always new. Always sensual. Sighing, I feel my pants tighten as I remember the ways she’s touched my body. But then I lift my hands gripping the wheel as I remember how she’s told me not to touch myself. So instead I switch the gear to drive, and I head home.

My apartment was much bigger than hers. But it was more dark and less welcoming. Bucky liked to come over a lot and decorate. I had soft beige carpeting, while she had grey. My kitchen was bigger but had less food. My bathroom a bit messy, my bed king sized and by the window so I had view of the sky at night. Her average sized canopy bed rested far from the window, more against the wall in the middle of the room. Her windows were small , her decorations orderly and sleek. Minimal.

The curtains in her room which were light and colored lilac were always kept open, which contributed to the brightness of her room. But it fit her. That night I slept holding a T-shirt I had stolen from her in secrecy only because she wouldn’t let me keep any of her clothing. I remember taking it to help me feel as though I slept with her at night. She’d send me back home usually after spending time together, and if it was too late she’d let me sleep in her bed while she slept on the sofa. I slip my hands in between my legs and curl into a ball underneath my covers. It was cold that night. Middle November. So it was starting to chill.
